meanings.definition: Relating to the making of maps.
meanings.sent1: The cartographically skilled explorer drew detailed maps of the terrain.
meanings.sent2: The cartographically accurate map helped the travelers navigate the unfamiliar land.
meanings.sent3: The cartographically inclined artist even mapped out the best spots for picnics.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked cartographically, plotting out each step of her journey.
meanings.sent5: The cartographically precise drawing captured every hill and valley with precision.

meanings.definition: In a manner related to the creation of maps.
meanings.sent1: She planned her route cartographically, ensuring she wouldn't get lost.
meanings.sent2: The explorer traveled cartographically, documenting every detail of his journey.
meanings.sent3: He humorously claimed to think cartographically even when choosing a restaurant.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts moved cartographically, mapping out the possibilities in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The artist's hand moved cartographically across the canvas, creating a masterpiece.
